thread.title: Narendra Modi Meerut Rally Live: PM slams Samajwadi Party for poor law and order, corruption
thread.title_full: Narendra Modi Meerut Rally Live: PM slams Samajwadi Party for poor law and order, corruption - The Financial Express

author: FE Online
title: Narendra Modi Meerut Rally Live: PM slams Samajwadi Party for poor law and order, corruption
text:
The rally is being conducted in Shatabdi Nagar ground, opposite the RSS institute of Madhav Kunj, famously known for the RSS Shakhas that are conducted there. (Source: Twitter/BJP India) Prime Minister Narendra Modi is scheduled to address a huge gathering at Uttar Pradesh’s Meerut. The PM will be addressing people from 7 constituencies of Meerut, three constituencies from Bhagpat, six constituencies of Muzzafarnagar, the Modinagar constituency of Ghaziabad and the Hapur constituency of the Hapur Zilla. The rally is being conducted in Shatabdi Nagar ground, opposite the RSS institute of Madhav Kunj, famously known for the RSS Shakhas that are conducted here. The Prime Minister has arrived for the almost hour long campaign at approximately 1:30 PM today and begin his speech at 2 PM. Today’s event will be immediately followed by another rally by the Prime Minister at Aligarh tomorrow.
Here are all the live updates of the event:
2.16 pm: Modi hails contribution of Meerut’s sports industry.
2.13 pm: Tell me if I have done anything wrong in 2.5 years of NDA rule.
2.08 pm: PM attack Samajwadi Party for poor law and order in Uttar Pradesh.
2.07 pm: PM hails Meerut’s historic contribution in freedom movement.
